name: MS Office Product Spawning Exe in User Dir
description: Detects an executable in the users directory started from Microsoft Word, Excel, Powerpoint, Publisher or Visio
query: ((process.parent.executable:(/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Pp][Nn][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Pp][Uu][Bb]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Vv][Ii][Ss][Ii][Oo]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Aa][Cc][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Qq][Nn][Ee][Dd][Tt]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND (NOT (process.executable:/.*\\[Tt][Ee][Aa][Mm][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.parent.executable:(*\\WINWORD.EXE OR *\\EXCEL.EXE OR *\\POWERPNT.exe OR *\\MSPUB.exe OR *\\VISIO.exe OR *\\MSACCESS.exe OR *\\EQNEDT32.exe) AND process.executable:C\:\\users\\* AND process.executable:*.exe) AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\Teams.exe)))`
